price: 8. Yallih kitaabih aayoota kaal ankirriyimah yaabbeeh, tohuk lakat kaxxa-mariinitak koroosannul amo-ayxeeruk raaqa tet aabbewaah innah, toysa nabiyow Jahannam giráh digaaláy kaa qansarissal kaa ayti-kumus.
arabic: يَسۡمَعُ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَاۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
